title: KisPay Merchant App
description: A dedicated merchant dashboard and mobile-friendly web app for KisPay, enabling businesses to accept digital payments seamlessly via the KisPay ecosystem.
Features include QR code generation for payments, real-time transaction monitoring, sales analytics with interactive charts, refund processing, and settlement reports.
Integrated with major Ethiopian payment providers (Telebirr, CBE Birr, Awash Bank, Kacha) for instant payment notifications and automated reconciliation.
Provides secure merchant onboarding, KYC verification, and role-based access for business owners and staff.
Offers detailed insights into daily/weekly/monthly revenue, customer trends, and payment methods breakdown using Recharts for data visualization.
Built with a focus on usability for small to medium businesses in Ethiopia, ensuring fast performance and offline-capable transaction logging.
